mapper.insert: /*insertWashInfo*/ insert into iw_wash_info( corp_name, sido, sigungu, corp_type, wash_type, address, tel_no, latitude, longitude, reg_dt )values( #{corpName}, #{sido}, #{sigungu}, #{corpType}, #{washType}, #{address}, #{telNo}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, now() )
mapper.select: /*selectLocalInfoWashCount*/ SELECT sido,COUNT(*) cnt FROM iw_wash_info GROUP BY sido
